# Anatini.dev

> 76+ free, offline developer tools — powered by DuckDB-WASM. All processing happens in your browser. No uploads, no servers, no tracking.

## About

Anatini.dev is a collection of browser-based developer tools built on DuckDB-WASM, SheetJS, js-yaml, smol-toml, and the Web Crypto API. Every tool runs 100% client-side — your files never leave your machine. The site is free, requires no sign-up, and works offline after first load.

## Tools

### Converters
- [CSV → Parquet](https://anatini.dev/csv-to-parquet): Convert CSV files to Apache Parquet format with Snappy or Zstd compression
- [Parquet → CSV](https://anatini.dev/parquet-to-csv): Export Parquet files to CSV with delimiter options
- [CSV → JSON](https://anatini.dev/csv-to-json): Convert CSV to JSON Array or NDJSON format
- [JSON → CSV](https://anatini.dev/json-to-csv): Flatten JSON into CSV format
- [JSON → Parquet](https://anatini.dev/json-to-parquet): Convert JSON to Parquet with compression
- [Parquet → JSON](https://anatini.dev/parquet-to-json): Convert Parquet to JSON or NDJSON
- [Excel → CSV](https://anatini.dev/excel-to-csv): Convert Excel (.xlsx/.xls) to CSV with multi-sheet export
- [CSV → Excel](https://anatini.dev/csv-to-excel): Combine CSVs into an Excel workbook
- [YAML → JSON](https://anatini.dev/yaml-to-json): Convert YAML documents to JSON
- [JSON → YAML](https://anatini.dev/json-to-yaml): Convert JSON documents to YAML
- [XML → JSON](https://anatini.dev/xml-to-json): Convert XML to JSON with attribute handling
- [JSON → XML](https://anatini.dev/json-to-xml): Convert JSON to XML with customizable root element
- [TOML → JSON](https://anatini.dev/toml-to-json): Convert TOML config files to JSON
- [JSON → TOML](https://anatini.dev/json-to-toml): Convert JSON to TOML config format

### Viewers & Formatters
- [Delimited Viewer](https://anatini.dev/csv-viewer): View CSV/TSV/DSV with auto-delimiter detection, sorting, and column stats
- [Parquet Viewer](https://anatini.dev/parquet-viewer): Browse Parquet data, schema, and metadata
- [Excel Viewer](https://anatini.dev/excel-viewer): View Excel spreadsheets with multi-sheet navigation
- [JSON Formatter](https://anatini.dev/json-formatter): Format, minify, validate, sort JSON with tree view
- [XML Formatter](https://anatini.dev/xml-formatter): Format, minify, and validate XML documents
- [YAML Formatter](https://anatini.dev/yaml-formatter): Format, minify, and validate YAML documents
- [Log Viewer](https://anatini.dev/log-viewer): Filter logs by level with regex search
- [Hex Viewer](https://anatini.dev/hex-viewer): Inspect binary files with hex and ASCII columns

### Inspectors
- [CSV Inspector](https://anatini.dev/csv-inspector): Analyze CSV encoding, delimiter, types, and quality
- [JSON Inspector](https://anatini.dev/json-inspector): Explore JSON structure, schema consistency, and paths
- [Parquet Inspector](https://anatini.dev/parquet-inspector): Inspect Parquet metadata, row groups, and column stats

### Analysis & SQL
- [SQL Playground](https://anatini.dev/sql-playground): Query CSV, Parquet, JSON, and Excel files with full DuckDB SQL
- [Data Profiler](https://anatini.dev/data-profiler): Generate data quality reports with null, duplicate, and outlier detection
- [JSON Flattener](https://anatini.dev/json-flattener): Flatten nested JSON into tabular format
- [Schema Generator](https://anatini.dev/schema-generator): Generate DDL for PostgreSQL, MySQL, BigQuery, Snowflake
- [CSV → SQL](https://anatini.dev/csv-to-sql): Generate CREATE TABLE + INSERT statements from CSV
- [Dataset Diff](https://anatini.dev/dataset-diff): Compare two datasets and find added, removed, modified rows
- [Data Sampler](https://anatini.dev/data-sampler): Random or stratified sampling from datasets
- [Deduplicator](https://anatini.dev/deduplicator): Find and remove duplicate rows
- [SQL Formatter](https://anatini.dev/sql-formatter): Beautify and minify SQL with dialect support
- [Markdown Table](https://anatini.dev/markdown-table): Convert data to Markdown tables for GitHub/docs
- [Column Editor](https://anatini.dev/column-editor): Select, reorder, and rename columns
- [Data Merge](https://anatini.dev/data-merge): Join two datasets with visual merge interface
- [Pivot Table](https://anatini.dev/pivot-table): Build pivot tables with sum, count, avg aggregation
- [Chart Builder](https://anatini.dev/chart-builder): Create bar, line, area, pie, scatter charts from data
- [Regex Filter](https://anatini.dev/regex-filter): Filter dataset rows by regex pattern
- [CSV Splitter](https://anatini.dev/csv-splitter): Split large files by row count or column value
- [Data Anonymizer](https://anatini.dev/data-anonymizer): Mask, redact, hash, or fake sensitive columns
- [Data Generator](https://anatini.dev/data-generator): Generate realistic sample datasets

### Utilities
- [Base64 Encoder/Decoder](https://anatini.dev/base64): Encode and decode Base64 text or files
- [Hash Generator](https://anatini.dev/hash-generator): Generate SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512 hashes
- [JSON Schema Validator](https://anatini.dev/json-schema-validator): Validate JSON against schema definitions
- [JSON Diff](https://anatini.dev/json-diff): Compare two JSON documents side-by-side
- [URL Encoder/Decoder](https://anatini.dev/url-encoder): Encode and decode URLs and query strings
- [Cron Parser](https://anatini.dev/cron-parser): Parse and explain cron expressions in plain English
- [Encoding Detector](https://anatini.dev/encoding-detector): Detect file charset, BOM, and line endings
- [QR Code Generator](https://anatini.dev/qr-code): Generate QR codes from text or URLs
- [Image Compressor](https://anatini.dev/image-compressor): Compress images with quality control (JPEG, PNG, WebP)
- [Password Generator](https://anatini.dev/password-generator): Cryptographically secure passwords
- [Regex Tester](https://anatini.dev/regex-tester): Test regex with real-time match highlighting
- [Color Picker](https://anatini.dev/color-picker): Hex/RGB/HSL converter with WCAG contrast checking
- [Text Diff](https://anatini.dev/text-diff): Compare text blocks with line-by-line diff
- [UUID Generator](https://anatini.dev/uuid-generator): Generate UUID v4 (random) and v7 (timestamp)
- [Timestamp Converter](https://anatini.dev/timestamp-converter): Unix epoch ↔ human-readable dates
- [JWT Decoder](https://anatini.dev/jwt-decoder): Decode JWT header and payload with expiration status
- [SVG to PNG](https://anatini.dev/svg-to-png): Convert SVG to PNG with custom scale (1×–8×)
- [Favicon Generator](https://anatini.dev/favicon-generator): Generate favicons in all standard sizes
- [CSS Formatter](https://anatini.dev/css-formatter): Format or minify CSS stylesheets
- [JS Formatter](https://anatini.dev/js-formatter): Format or minify JavaScript code
- [Image to Base64](https://anatini.dev/image-to-base64): Convert images to Base64 data URIs
- [Markdown Editor](https://anatini.dev/markdown-editor): Write and preview Markdown live
- [Meta Tag Generator](https://anatini.dev/meta-tag-generator): Generate SEO, Open Graph, and Twitter meta tags
- [robots.txt Generator](https://anatini.dev/robots-txt-generator): Generate robots.txt with AI crawler rules
- [Chmod Calculator](https://anatini.dev/chmod-calculator): Calculate Unix file permissions visually
- [JSON to TypeScript](https://anatini.dev/json-to-typescript): Generate TS interfaces from JSON
- [Lorem Ipsum Generator](https://anatini.dev/lorem-ipsum): Generate placeholder text
- [HTML Entity Encoder](https://anatini.dev/html-entity-encoder): Encode and decode HTML entities
- [Slug Generator](https://anatini.dev/slug-generator): Generate URL-friendly slugs
- [Word & Character Counter](https://anatini.dev/word-counter): Count words, chars, reading time
- [.gitignore Generator](https://anatini.dev/gitignore-generator): Generate .gitignore from templates
- [Sitemap Generator](https://anatini.dev/sitemap-generator): Build XML sitemaps visually

- [How to Query CSV with SQL](https://anatini.dev/blog/how-to-query-csv-with-sql)
- [Offline Data Quality Profiler](https://anatini.dev/blog/offline-data-quality-profiler)
- [JSON vs CSV vs Parquet](https://anatini.dev/blog/json-vs-csv-vs-parquet)
- [How to Generate SQL from CSV](https://anatini.dev/blog/how-to-generate-sql-from-csv)
- [Why JSON Formatters Leak Data](https://anatini.dev/blog/why-json-formatter-leak-data)
- [Decode JWT Without a Server](https://anatini.dev/blog/decode-jwt-without-server)
- [Client-Side vs Server-Side Tools](https://anatini.dev/blog/client-side-vs-server-side-tools)

## Key Facts
- All 76+ tools are 100% free with no usage limits
- No data leaves the browser — fully offline after first load
- Powered by DuckDB-WASM for SQL-grade performance
- No sign-up, no cookies, no tracking
- Works with CSV, JSON, Parquet, Excel, YAML, XML, TOML, and more

## Sitemap
Full URL list: https://anatini.dev/sitemap.xml
